artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Masadaya Heikichi
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 288; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 295.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: two separate sheets; two men fighting with swords; man at left wears purple, grey and white striped pants and blue, yellow and white hand and arm guards; man at right wears pink, red and blue striped pants and purple and yellow hand and arm guards; green at bottom, purple at top, white at center
dimension: 9 7/8 × 7 1/4 in. (25.08 × 18.42 cm) (sheet, each, approx., Vertical chūban diptych)
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Chiba Fencing Club (Chiba gekken kai 千葉撃剣会)
title: Tanno Yoshikatsu and Suzuki Yoshitake
